snippet: The hosts of "Noticiero Univision," Jorge Ramos and María Elena Salinas, will urge Mitt Romney and President Obama to participate in a debate or forum for its Hispanic viewers.
abstract: The hosts of "Noticiero Univision," Jorge Ramos and María Elena Salinas, will urge Mitt Romney and President Obama to participate in a debate or forum for its Hispanic viewers.

headline.main: On Univision's Nightly News, a Plea for Presidential Debate on Latino Issues
